alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued September 19 at 8:10AM AKDT until September 20 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Significant coastal flooding occuring. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Low lying areas could flood. Some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Shoreline erosion will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels will slowly fall through through Monday afternoon, but high surf with coastal erosion will continue through noon Tuesday. Winds will turn west to northwest and increase to 25 mph this evening and continue into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
